topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b071a363687234ed000561#post_55b071a363687234ed000561
Funny story. Apparently they modernized some of them, but kept the dialogue. For instance, Romeo and Juliet now takes place in modern times. But for others, like A Midsummer Night's Dream, they kept the setting while keeping the dialogue.
